select.if: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM uTrade WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM used_detail WHERE used_detail.uDetail_id = uTrade.uDetail_id AND MONTH(used_detail.uDetail_Date) = #{monthnum})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rTrade WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM rental_detail WHERE rental_detail.rDetail_id = rTrade.rDetail_id AND MONTH(rental_detail.rDetail_Date) = #{monthnum})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM aTrade WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM auction_detail WHERE auction_detail.aDetail_id = aTrade.aDetail_id AND MONTH(auction_detail.aDetail_Date) = #{monthnum})

mapper.select: SELECT sum(u.uDetail_price) + sum(r.rDetail_price) + sum(a.aDetail_price) FROM used_detail AS u JOIN rental_detail AS r JOIN auction_detail AS a WHERE MONTH(u.uDetail_Date) = #{month} OR MONTH(r.rDetail_Date) = #{month} OR MONTH(a.aDetail_Date) = #{month}
SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE MONTH(user_date) = #{month}
SELECT * FROM inquiry ORDER BY inq_date DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry SET inq_answer = #{answer}, inq_status = '답변완료' WHERE inq_id = (SELECT inq_id FROM (SELECT inq_id FROM inquiry AS inquiry ORDER BY inq_date DESC LIMIT 10) AS i_t LIMIT #{find}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM report ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.update: UPDATE report SET report_answer = #{claimanswer}, report_status = '답변완료' WHERE report_id = (SELECT report_id FROM (SELECT report_id FROM report AS report ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10) AS r_t LIMIT #{find}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT inq_id, user_email, inq_category, inq_title, inq_content , inq_answer, inq_status, DATE_FORMAT(inq_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS inq_date FROM inquiry
SELECT report_id, user_email, report_reported, report_category, report_url , report_comment, report_answer, report_status, DATE_FORMAT(report_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS report_date FROM report
